official-title.#text:
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt foreign pensions from dispositions of
			 investment in United States real property.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Incentivizing Foreign Investment to Upgrade America’s Infrastructure Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Incentivizing Foreign Investment to Upgrade America’s Infrastructure Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text: Exemption of foreign pensions from dispositions of investment in United States real property

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by adding at the end the following new
			 subsection:

external-xref.#tail: of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall not apply in the case of a qualified foreign pension fund.

quote.#tail: means any trust, corporation, or other organization or arrangement—

text.#text: For purposes of this subsection, the term
which is created or organized outside of the United States,

which is established to provide retirement or pension benefits to participants or beneficiaries
			 that are current or former employees (or persons designated by such
			 employees) of one or more employers in consideration for services
			 rendered,

which does not have a single participant or beneficiary with a right to more than 5 percent of its
			 assets,

which is subject to government regulation and provides annual information reporting about its
			 beneficiaries to the relevant tax authorities in the country in which it
			 is established or operates, and
with respect to which, under the laws of the country in which it is established or operates—

contributions to such trust, corporation, organization, or arrangement which would otherwise be
			 subject to tax under such laws are deductible or excluded from the gross
			 income of such entity or taxed at a reduced rate, or

taxation of any investment income of such trust, corporation, organization, or arrangement is
			 deferred or such income is taxed at a reduced rate.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may prescribe such regulations as are necessary to carry out the purposes of this
			 subsection.
is amended by adding at the end the following:
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Paragraph (3) of section 1445(f) of such Code

quote.#text: Such term shall not include a qualified foreign pension fund (as defined in

text.#text:
The amendments made by this section shall apply to dispositions of United States real property
			 interests more than 90 days after the date of the enactment of this Act.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 5251 IH: Incentivizing Foreign Investment to Upgrade America’s Infrastructure Act of 2014
